pages.name: Goldar Maximus
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Power Rangers Beast Morphers (2019, TV Series)$(br)Health:125

If you have Morph X Canister in your inventory Goldar will transform into Goldar Maximus $(br2)Drops Chance to Drop: $(li)5 $(l:mmpr/items/mmpr_logo)MMPR Logos$(/l)$(br) $(li)1 $(l:mmpr/items/power_coins#tyrannosaurus_power_coin)Tyrannosaurus Power Coin$(/l)
